website_summaries.verdict: Choose this L'Occitane cream if your top concern is sensitive skin; otherwise you may not need this formula or find it to be as effective as others by the brand.
pros: For users with sensitive skin, this 5% shea butter formula that also includes karitene and vitamin E is a good choice
A gentle cream that can also be used on the face
cons: Mixed reviews on the scent – some users enjoy it, while others find it overpowering
Not quite as moisturizing as others by the brand

website_summaries.verdict: Just a little bit of this facial cream is all you'll need to hydrate extremely dry skin.
pros: A little goes a long way, this product will last you a long time, even with daily use
Leaves dry skin glowing, feeling soft and smooth – not sticky
Can be used day or night
cons: Not great for extremely sensitive skin
Some users complained about the thick texture and strong smell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cream since July 30 ..! It leaves my skin feeling so soft. I usually apply it to my face before going to bed and when I wake up omg my skin feels nourished and hidrated .!! Will definitely recommend it and will buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Zoraya Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Probably not great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this cream (and the cleansing oil and water). However, it ended up giving me some skin irritation/spots I wasn’t expecting. I tried a sample of this on my hand in a l’Occcitane store—it calmed my red hands down immediately but had the opposite effect on my face over the course of several days. I wonder if the fragrance—which wasn’t initially overwhelming but got that way—could have something to do with the irritation. I recommend getting a decent sample if you can before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get past the scent 🙈
customer_reviews.text: FIRST, I AM DEFINITELY ULTRA SENSITIVE TO SCENTS. SO IF YOU’RE NOT OVERALL I THINK THIS IS A GOOD CREAM BUT IF YOU ARE SENSITIVE TO SCENTS BEING TOO STRONG YOU MIGHT WANT TO LOOK FOR SOMETHING ELSE. IT DOES NOT STINK, IT’S JUST TOO STRONG OF A SCENT FOR ME TO WEAR ON MY FACE. IMHO 🙈 (caps an accident, lol, didn’t know Siri did that 🤣)
customer_reviews.author: Lettie’s Life

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I find myself recommending this company to people who fight dry skin, no one can beat L’Occitane. This company’s products are always going to be more expensive then I’d prefer but the quality is consistent and superior to cheaper alternatives so I just grimace when I hit purchase and make sure I don’t waste any. My fiancé uses this particular product, she has combination skin with occasional breakouts and this lotion keeps her skin moisturized without the pore clogging of most other facial lotions. Plus, the smell is pleasant and light.
customer_reviews.author: regina

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with L'Occitane
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. This is my second purchase of it, and it works wonders on my combination skin. Good mix of being light while also moisturizing the areas that get dry. I use this every night and I have noticed a definite difference from any previous moisturizers. But I must also include that I live in a very humid place, so it's lightness it very important. If you live somewhere dryer, would suggest the ultra version.
customer_reviews.author: Avery Little

customer_reviews.title: Get ready for a magical glow
customer_reviews.text: At age 35, I have tried maaaaaany moisturizers. They were either too sticky, greasy or didn't make me feel hydrated enough. Luckily, I got a sample of this moisturizer and I fell in love. I was so happy that I was able to find it here- Exactly what I was looking for- a moisturizer that's not too greasy and yet makes my skin feel soft and smooth. I get so many compliments on my "glowing" skin. I am definitely going to purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Choo Choo's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Light, soothing and high quality cream
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin and was concerned that a Shea butter based cream would make the oily areas of my skin more shiny. Luckily that doesn't happen! I use it once a day and apply it in the morning after i clean my face with Loccitane Shea milk and i spray it with a tonic.I appreciate the the texture of this cream, it's light and easily applied.
customer_reviews.author: zajasna

customer_reviews.title: L'Occitane light 5% shea butter face cream is wonderful and smells fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I love L'Occitane light 5% shea butter face cream for normal to combination skin is a wonderful cream. I feels so good on your face and has a subtle phenomenal scent. I truly love this cream, my introduction to it was from a daughter in law and a gift of samples! I have been buying it ever since and hate to run out. Try it, you'll love it, too!
customer_reviews.author: lgs

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I wondered what all the fuss could be about, until i tried it. This cream has a perfect light creamy texture and a clean, kind of powdery, scent. It absorbs quickly so I'd actually consider using it during the day, but for now it is my night cream. It makes my skin feel. . . Comforted. And not a bit greasy. Just perfect. I think ill order some eye cream next.
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: Get it! Works for Bobot dry abs oily skin
customer_reviews.text: It’s been i long time since I wanted this moisturizer and I always prefer to buy my skin care at store I was skeptical about this I won’t lie But I’m super happy with me ordering this here Because with all the situation now it’s better that way I’m obsessed with the smell of it and texture
customer_reviews.author: Romy naim

customer_reviews.title: Baby skin
customer_reviews.text: I have combination face skin, and have tried millions of skin care products. This moisturizer is one of the only two which made my skin feel soft and hydrated. The other one is Hope in a Jar, but it contains alpha hydroxyl acid which requires perfect sunscreen to prevent skin from sunburn.
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dry&cold upstate NY winter
customer_reviews.text: This cream is very rich yet leaves no greasiness on the skin. It gets absorbed so quickly and thoroughly and moisturizes well that it has become my go-to cream in drier climates. Some might not call the smell fragrant compared to other flower-themed cream (like the peony moisturizer which is also great), but I find the smell pleasant enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for Excema and moisturzing without being greasy.
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST face moisturizer I've ever used. It only takes a tiny bit for entire face and neck coverage. I'm 60 and just starting to see those little lines and have also developed Excema. This takes care of both and doesn't make my oily skin more so or break out. Love, love love!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SHAY RON

customer_reviews.title: This is not the same as Sephora - BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I thought the consistency was oily and also my face broke and and is really DRY after using this product. I bought it from Sephora and compared....they are VERY DIFFERENT. I wanted to return but I had already opened it and used it a few times. $30 trash.
customer_reviews.author: qball

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this face cream
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this face cream. In only a few short days my complexion has become clearer and is well moisturized. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: GoddessofhisWorld

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer For The Dry Winter Months!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Smell is light and refreshing. Super moisturizing. My face is really dry in the winter to the point where my skin will peel like I’m sun burned but this moisturizer keeps my skin soft and peel free! I love all L’Occitanes products so I’m partial to this but it’s one of my fave moisturizers.
customer_reviews.author: MamaOfManyMD

customer_reviews.title: Great facial moisturizer during winter!
customer_reviews.text: So far my most favorite facial moisturizer. The best use is during the winter after getting wind burn from snowboarding. Feels so nice, not greasy. Thick but not heavy feeling. Does a great job hydrating chafed skin.
customer_reviews.author: H. Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Smell too strong
customer_reviews.text: Well...just got it. Nice packaging, nice look. Feels lightweight. But I have to agree with those who say the smell is nauseating. Smells very strongly of baby powder & doesn't go away. I don't think I can tolerate it. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so gentle on skin
customer_reviews.text: This is the light comfort cream so it's very light & gentle on the skin, but moisturizers well. It's perfect for warm climates and spring/summer months. The scent is just fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Aislinn

customer_reviews.title: amazing product
customer_reviews.text: such a good product! super comforting, not heavy but so moisturizing - works for all seasons! And good ingredients too, which is very important. It's not cheap but it's absolutely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Lourette

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: Will re-order again. Product was very light and can be used several times per day without being oily. Made my skin feel extremely good. Only need to use very little. One container last months.
customer_reviews.author: Christmas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Overnight Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Finally I have found the right moisturizer for my aging, mostly normal, sometimes dry but very sensitive skin. The shea butter is just the right amount in the formula to perform well without leaving a heavy residue. This is perfect for overnight moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Breaking out
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for one week and my face is breaking out in hard cysts! I'm almost 60 years old. I don't know what's in this stuff, but it's going in the trash. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Medieval momma

customer_reviews.title: Light and wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I use this cream every morning under my sunscreen. It's funny that they call it "comfort cream" -- because that's exactly what it is!
customer_reviews.author: H. Joplin

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best face cream I've used in a long time. It's Lightweight enough to be used in hot humid climate, but leaves the skin soft and with elasticity. Perfect to be used under make up or by it self. Note that if you're someone that sweats a lot it better not to put it on the skin above your lips. Everything L'Occitane is good, in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check the size.
customer_reviews.text: The size of this cream is unbelievably tiny for the cost. Having used this company's products before has been fine but this price is out of line. I Y
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: It’s like gold!
customer_reviews.text: I love this facial lotion! I’m definitely gonna keep buying it! I have dry skin and this stuff right here. Magic! Doesn’t over moisturize.. Perfect for before applying makeup and during makeup wear. Leaves the perfect glow to my skin! Xoxo
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell - feels great.
customer_reviews.text: Cream feels great, but the perfumed fragrance is a little stronger then I'd like. Don't get me wrong, it's a very pleasant smell, just a little strong for the a face cream.
customer_reviews.author: WCK

customer_reviews.title: no break out no greasy moisturizes so well
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! It arrived very quickly, smells so good and makes my face very soft. I have ace prone skin I didn't break out and it even helped my scars to hel and it doesn't have a greasy feeling either. It smells very good too. Definitely recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: Gulin k

customer_reviews.title: L-Occitane light Shea butter face cream
customer_reviews.text: This is One of my favorite facial cream , use this in warm months. Feels great on skin,. Came at decent time & packaged very well..Will re-order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn W

customer_reviews.title: Like Buying L’Occitaine Light from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for a long time but switched to buying it from Amazon when our local L’Occitaine store went out of business. Pleased to report the L’Occitaine Light Cream and the timely shipping were perfect! Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Blue Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite actually I was unfortunately hoping for better, just smelled a little weird and not as hydrating as I hoped
customer_reviews.author: Lexola

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This feels great on my face, but it's too much fragrance. **after using, has caused a rosacea flare-up, skin really irritated. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jones

customer_reviews.title: but could have been worse. I have super sensitive acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: Made me break out, but could have been worse. I have super sensitive acne prone skin...just about everything makes me break out. Still on the hunt to find something. I have used the Divine Cream in the past, and it doesn't seem to cause me breakouts, but it is very expensive and a bit too greasy.
customer_reviews.author: cs currey

customer_reviews.title: Good face moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: Good face moisturizer for day and night. Feels wonderful, lasts well and price is fair. I would like to see the company add a sunscreen agent to the formulation.
customer_reviews.author: J. Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great night cream alternative
customer_reviews.text: Like most of L'Occitane's products, this is high-quality and exceeded my expectations. A great light night cream for those of us who find regular night cream too heavy but want something more moisturizing when the makeup comes off at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: My wife's favorite
customer_reviews.text: My wife's favorite face cream. Rubs in easily and leaves her skin smooth and radiant. As a bonus, has a nice, light, fresh scent.
customer_reviews.author: BigHemi

customer_reviews.title: I also use & love the milk cleanser by L'Occitane
customer_reviews.text: Just simply luxurious. Leaves my skin very soft. I also use & love the milk cleanser by L'Occitane.
customer_reviews.author: Rose McC.

customer_reviews.title: L'Occitane moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I like this moisturizer. It is not greasy. It also absorbs into the skin quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: No grease, only needs a little bit for the whole face.
customer_reviews.text: Keep my face moisturizer the all day. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Abrego

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, esp for the Fall and Winter months
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, esp for the Fall and Winter months. The soothing shea butter keeps my skin dewy, but dries quickly for makeup application. Great scent and formula. A+
customer_reviews.author: Toms_Girl

customer_reviews.title: Did not like it
customer_reviews.text: Fragrance is ok but after applying it feels too thick on face. Did not like it
customer_reviews.author: E Lopes

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE, smells amazing and really helps with my dry skin. Great moisturizer and helps my makeup look flawless.
customer_reviews.author: kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: The cream is light and does an excellent job of moisturizing my skin. After a couple of minutes it does not feel greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer, but the smell is too strong
customer_reviews.text: Light, super moisturizing, and more affordable then the other creams by L'Occitane. It smells really nice, I just wish it wasn't quite as strong of a scent.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: This face cream is excellent for my skin during our frigid winter! I always use L’Occitane products! They exceed my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen M. DuMont

customer_reviews.title: It's wonderful stuff. While I was in the hospital
customer_reviews.text: It's wonderful stuff. While I was in the hospital, a friend brought me a jar because of skin problems. It worked like a charm. Now I use it all the time.Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Best Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love using this product almost daily. Really works well to keep your size nice and fresh each day to work or on the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mikoshiba

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and easy to apply. Does not give me acne like others.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this cream
customer_reviews.text: I love using this cream on my face. It smells so good and leaves my skin so soft. I'll buy it again and again!
customer_reviews.author: H. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Good Cream
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream! It has a fabulous scent. Not oily just perfect. Relaxing cream!
customer_reviews.author: ShanLynn5

customer_reviews.title: Not as general as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and when I applied this it burnt my face as if it had fregrance in it. Coconut oil soothed it after I washed it off. I was bummed
customer_reviews.author: LadyGee

customer_reviews.title: Still looking
customer_reviews.text: Too greasy. I have a oil clogged pore at least once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Good for everyday and esp. for sensitive skin. Good all-around moisturizer with a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: It is thick but absorbs quickly and has a nice, light scent
customer_reviews.text: This face cream is lovely. It is thick but absorbs quickly and has a nice, light scent.
customer_reviews.author: Jennine

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: So light and makes my skin so soft, love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: smells wonderful and not too heavy. Doesn't clog pores either
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA H PRICE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful face cream! Love the texture and they way it works! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Container seal arrived open - recieved returned used cream
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the cream and when the package arrived the cream container seal was open. It looks like the cream has been used. There was less cream than usual.. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Great for all skin types
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE this face cream! Super light weight and fast absorbing. I have oily skin and this actually helps to control the oil.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: 3.7 Rating!
customer_reviews.text: The product is very moisturizing and comforting like advertised and smells just like baby lotion but it does not change or lighten your face appearance
customer_reviews.author: Britmania C.

customer_reviews.title: You just need a little
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream I brought my first jar in WI while on a contract job,I just brought my second jar.Love it 💃🏼
customer_reviews.author: Sandrita 🙏🏼🌈

customer_reviews.title: Excellent face and neck cream.
customer_reviews.text: This cream has a wonderful texture and a nice scent. Plus a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: ClassicFun

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel fresh
customer_reviews.text: Light non greasy soothing face cream which I bought after trying a sample. The cream feels good and I use it everyday on my face
customer_reviews.author: Martha Fuhrmann

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fabulous. Light on face and easy scent. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do love this aptly named cream...it feels so good...I will buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Amy O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Super good
customer_reviews.text: Love it too much make my skin sooo soft and healthy
customer_reviews.author: Jie

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizing product.
customer_reviews.text: It's very moisturizing, not greasy, and feels smooth after use. If you are dry skin, you will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Huiqi

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product for skin especially if you are in dry climate area.
customer_reviews.author: Nana-swari

customer_reviews.title: Simply good
customer_reviews.text: Simply good product. It keeps my face skin smooth and prevents dry.
customer_reviews.author: Pokemonjet

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It smells wonderful but it leaves my oily skin feeling greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Colbert

customer_reviews.title: Nice texture, non-greasy good for all skin types
customer_reviews.text: Nice texture, non-greasy good for all skin types. I have mild roscea and this cream took away some redness and soothed my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice finish.
customer_reviews.text: It's light and when apply makeup over it, the makeup is not dry .. nice finish.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream! Very light, fantastic smell and natural! I think all L'Occitane products just amazing,especially this one!
customer_reviews.author: Oleg D.

customer_reviews.title: The scent is a deterrent to using it.
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the scent. It would be more pleasant to use if it had no scent at all.
customer_reviews.author: catherine a. connolly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: The wife has a very sensitive skin, we tried a lot of products but nothing matches this obe.
customer_reviews.author: orel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great, very light cream. I use very little of it and it lasts
customer_reviews.author: Julia Kay

customer_reviews.title: Good for hot and humid weather
customer_reviews.text: This light face cream works well as a morning and evening moisturizer, especially in hot and humid weather.
customer_reviews.author: springcustomer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice clean smell. Not quite as moisturizing as I expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have SUPER sentitive skin and this really works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Generally Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I originally really liked this because it was light and seemed to absorb well leaving the texture of my skin silky. The only issue I've discovered upon using it for awhile is that it leaves my skin shiny and I feel like I need to use some powder.
customer_reviews.author: P. Shea

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel of L'Occitane Shea
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of l'occitane Shea creams. Smell is wonderful and makes your skin feel so good.mi like this light cream during the day but use the 25% Shea at night.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Every Day
customer_reviews.text: I'm never disappointed in L'Occitane products - this cream is a light version of my favorite Shea cream.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far I like how good it makes my skin feel.
customer_reviews.author: Veronicat

product_meta.title: L'Occitane Comforting Cream, 1.7 oz
product_meta.description:
The Light Comforting Cream is specially formulated to help nourish and protect skin in need of intensive hydration. Its light texture is infused with 5% shea butter, rich in vitamin E, omega 6 and karitene to answer the essential needs of normal to combination skin, even sensitive. Moisture is locked into the skin, leaving it soft, supple and comfortable all day.

BRAND STORY
By L'Occitane

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
